question: You are taking a course at a local college. The deadline for your project was last week but you haven't finished it.Write a letter to your lecturer. In your letterintroduce yourselfexplain why you haven't handed in the project yetrequest more time to do it.
text: My name is Rubina and I am a student in a fourth-year computer science class at your prestigious institution. I am writing this to inform you that I was unable to submit the assigned machine learning project within last week's timeline due to my health issues.
I have been always regular and sincere with my studies throughout my graduation. You will see from your records that I have never missed a deadline for an assignment throughout my course.

I was well aware of the due date but unfortunately, I was diagnosed with COVID because of which I was hospitalised. As you might also be aware that I was absent from the class for the previous 10 days and I have not been attending lectures because of the mandatory quarantine period.

By God's grace, I have recovered now but I am afraid that I need a little more time to finish the project. I have already completed the draft and therefore, would like to request  one week 's extension to hand over the project.
I hope you will understand my situation and grant me a grace period for the submission.
